item.title: Cape Cobra vs Dolphins 2nd Semi-Final Momentum Cup Dream11 Fantasy11 Preview
item.author: Rexer
item.description:
Welcome to the 2nd semi-final of Momentum One Day Cup 2017-18. This ground is high scoring ground. We will be providing match predictions, probable XI, tips and some tricks to help you win big in this match.

Both the teams are meeting head to head for the 3rd time in this tournament. Dolphins had won both of them leaving Cobra team thirsty for a win. Cape Cobras will be aiming to end the stranglehold the Dolphins have held over them this season when they meet in the second Momentum One-Day Cup semi-final at PPC Newlands in Cape Town today.

Event Details

Momentum One Day Cup 2017-18 Cape Cobra vs Dolphins

  • Newlands, Cape Town
  • Date: Jan 31, 5:00 PM IST
Venue ODI Stats
  • Total matches 39
  • Matches won batting first 21
  • Matches won bowling first 23
  • Average 1st Inns scores 332
  • Average 2nd Inns scores 296
Squads
Cobras:

Rory Kleinveldt (c), Dayyaan Galiem, Zubayr Hamza, Simon Khomari, George Linde, Pieter Malan, Aviwe Mgijima, Tshepo Moreki, Mthiwekhaya Nabe, Dane Piedt, Dane Paterson, Vernon Philander, Jason Smith, Kyle Verreynne.

Dolphins:

Kehsav Maharaj (c), Sarel Erwee, Senuran Muthusamy, Sibonelo Makhanya, Calvin Savage, Robert Frylinck, Athi Maposa, Zack Paruk, Prenelan Subrayen, Morne van Wyk, Dane Vilas, Smangaliso Nhlebela, Mthokozisi Shezi, Vaughn van Jaarsveld.

Team News

Dumny and Zondo will not be playin this match. Rory Kleinveldt and Keshav Maharaj will be captains instead.

Key Players
Cobras:
  • Pieter Malan
  • Dane Paterson
  • Mthiwekhaya Nabe
Dolphins:
  • Dane Vilas
  • Senuran Muthusamy
  • Keshav Maharaj
Cobras vs Dolphins Probable Playing XI :
Cobras:

Rory Kleinveldt(c), Dayyaan Galiem, Dane Paterson, Aviwe Mgijima, George Linde, Simon Khomari, Zubayr Hamza, Kyle Verreynne (wk), Pieter Malan, Mthiwekhaya Nabe, Jason Smith

Dolphins:

Morne van Wyk, Vaughn van Jaarsveld, Dane Vilas (wk), Prenelan Subrayen, Keshav Maharaj(c), Mthokozisi Shezi, Sarel Erwee, Senuran Muthusamy, Robbie Frylinck, Athi Mpendulo Maposa, Sibonelo Makhanya

Dream Teams

Suggestions
  • Dane Vilas is hte only good choice as wicket keeper.
  • Pieter Malan, Morne van Wyk , Sarel Erwee are good choices.
  • There is obvious choice in all rounders section - JSenuran Muthusamy and George Linde.
  • Dane Paterson, Prenelan Subrayen and Rory Kleinveldt can be selected as bowlers.

Let us know your favourite team and your favourite players. You can contact us for any suggestion or query.

item.title: Titans vs Warriors 1st Semi-Final Momentum Cup
item.author: Rexer
item.description:
Welcome to the 1st semi-final of Momentum One Day Cup 2017-18. We will be providing match predictions, probable XI, tips and some tricks to help you win big in this match.

TItan by far is the strongest team in the tournament with 7 wins and 2 losses and sits on top in the tournament table. Warriors are on number 4 in the table with 4 wins and 6 losses.

Event Details

Momentum One Day Cup 2017-18 Titans vs Warriors

  • SuperSport Park, Centurion
  • Date: Jan 30, 5:00 PM IST
Venue ODI Stats
  • Total matches 50
  • Matches won batting first 21
  • Matches won bowling first 27
  • Average 1st Inns scores 248
  • Average 2nd Inns scores 213
Squads
Titans:

Henry Davids, Tony de Zorzi, Rivaldo Moonsamy, Heinrich Klaasen(w), Heino Kuhn, Farhaan Behardien, Albie Morkel(c), David Wiese, Shimane Alfred Mothoa, Shaun von Berg, Junior Dala, Malusi Siboto, Dean Elgar

Warriors:

Gihahn Cloete, Lesiba Ngoepe, Edward Michael Moore, JJ Smuts(c), Yaseen Vallie, Colin Ackermann, Clyde Fortuin(w), Sisanda Magala, Andrew Birch, Ayabulela Gqamane, Anrich Nortje, Christiaan Jonker, Lutho Sipamla

Key Players
Titans:
  • Heinrich Klaasen
  • Rivaldo Moonsamy
  • Farhaan Behardien
  • Albie Morkel
Warriors:
  • Gihahn Cloete
  • Colin Ackermann
  • Anrich Nortje
  • Sisanda Magala
Titans vs Warriors Probable Playing XI :
Titans:

Henry Davids, Tony de Zorzi, Rivaldo Moonsamy, Heinrich Klaasen(w), Heino Kuhn, Farhaan Behardien, Albie Morkel(c), David Wiese, Shimane Alfred Mothoa, Shaun von Berg, Junior Dala

Warriros:

Gihahn Cloete, Lesiba Ngoepe, Edward Michael Moore, JJ Smuts(c), Yaseen Vallie, Colin Ackermann, Clyde Fortuin(w), Sisanda Magala, Andrew Birch, Ayabulela Gqamane, Anrich Nortje

Dream Teams

Suggestions
  • Heinrich Klaasen is better in wicket keeper section but Gihahn Cloete can also be taken in team.
  • Farhaan Behardien, Heino Kuhn , Mohammed Yaseen Vallie are good choices.
  • There is obvious choice in all rounders section - JJ Smuts, Albie Morkel, Colin Ackermann.
  • Sisanda Magala and Junior Dala can be selected as bowlers.

Let us know your favourite team and your favourite players. You can contact us for any suggestion or query.
